message.body: hey. 12pm. starbucks. on sherman way, between sepulveda and woodley. just off the 405 north.
Traffic is terrible! Hopefully we'll be there soon. :(
np. just wanted to make sure you weren't lost.
Traffic is terrible! Hopefully we'll be there soon. :(

found a place in noho. $600/mo. has sinks in main room AND restroom!
private studio? hmmm...
Are you going to take it?
gonna look at it monday. that means that you, me and rich have to make a minimum of $200/mo each to pay for it. but, there will be access to all of my flash, art reference, equipment, etc...
I can't do it right now, but I would be VERY interested in it when I am good enough to charge and have a car.
